pkgmetadata.longdescription: Setup and connect to 'OpenTripPlanner' // Setup and connect to 'OpenTripPlanner' (OTP) http://www.opentripplanner.org/. OTP is an open source platform for multi-modal and multi-agency journey planning written in 'Java'. The package allows you to manage a local version or connect to remote OTP server. This package has been peer-reviewed by rOpenSci (v. 0.2.0.0).
